column4: x isn't using the right resolution with my lcd (1400x900), although /var/log/Xorg.0.log shows it as a detected mode.  I can add it via xrandr and set it (although gnome acts a little weird at that point), but how do I get x to just use it properly (preferably with a minimum of xorg.conf hackery, mine is empty, and proud of it :p
in OpenSUSE i used to use resolution900... seemed to work...
sets the proper resolution without any xorg.conf hacking
